java.lang.String.value: Demo project on SalesForce web application
HTML connector connecting on salesforce.com website
This transaction is a part of the demo initialization. It checks if the ConvertigoDemo campaign exists in the SalesForce account used, and creates it if it doesn't exist.

transaction.handlers: // handlers are handled by Statements for HTML Transaction.

transaction.wsdltype:
<xsd:complexType name="SalesForceConnector__DefaultWebClippingTransactionResponse">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:group maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="p_ns:SalesForceConnectorTypes"/>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:group name="SalesForceConnectorTypes">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="p_ns:ConvertigoError"/>
<xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##any"/>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:group>
transaction.handlers: // handlers are handled by Statements for HTML Transaction.
